general.a1: Konty is a modern point-of-sale system that helps businesses digitize their operations. It enables sales tracking, inventory management, reporting, and compliance.
general.a2: Yes, Konty works offline too. All data is stored locally and syncs automatically when you reconnect to the internet.
general.a3: You can start in just 5 minutes! Sign up, add products, and start selling. No installation or special hardware required.
general.a4: Yes, Konty is fully compliant with US tax regulations. Automatically generates compliant receipts and reports.
general.a5: You get 30 days of free access to all features. No credit card required. After expiry, choose the plan that suits you.
general.q2: Can I use Konty without internet?
general.q3: How quickly can I start using it?
general.q5: How does the free trial work?

pricing.a1: We have three plans: Starter ($29), Standard ($49), and Premium ($129) per month. Each plan includes different features.
pricing.a2: No hidden costs. The plan price includes everything - updates, support, and hosting. You only pay the monthly subscription.

hospitality.description: When Saturday night becomes chaos, these are the POS system features that matter.

kitchenDisplay.description: Internet dies? Your kitchen display system keeps working. Power flickers? Orders still there. Never lose a $300 catering order again.
kitchenDisplay.title: Kitchen Display System That Never Loses Orders

staffManagement.description: Color-coded, mistake-proof interface. No modifier nightmares. No manager overrides needed. Even your nephew can run it. Cut training time by 75%.
staffManagement.title: New Server? Trained in 15 Minutes

tableManagement.description: Real-time table management sync that works even offline. Your restaurant POS shows every server the same view. No angry customers, no comped meals. Save $500+/week on comp'd meals.
tableManagement.title: Table Management That Actually Works

hospitality.title: Restaurant POS Features Built for Your 3 AM Problems

customerInsights.description: See patterns humans miss. Send offers that actually convert. No complex analytics degree required. 3x higher email conversion rates.
customerInsights.title: Know What They'll Buy Before They Do

retail.description: The best POS for small retail business. Focus on customers, not fixing tech problems.

inventory.description: Your POS system with inventory tracking auto-reorders before you're out. Barcode scanner integration for quick counts. Increase sales 15% by never being out of stock.
inventory.title: Inventory Management That Never Runs Out

quickCheckout.description: Scan, pay, done. Works with any payment type. Lines move fast, customers come back. Handle 40% more customers during rush.
quickCheckout.title: Checkout in 30 Seconds, Not 3 Minutes

retail.title: Retail POS System That Sells More, Counts Less

testimonials.description: Real stories from your peers who switched and survived their worst nights

t1.name: Mike Peterson
t1.quote: Before Konty, we had problems tracking tables and orders. Now servers work faster, kitchen is always synced, and guests notice how much more efficient our service is.

t2.name: Helen Marcus
t2.quote: Konty POS made inventory management and invoicing so much easier. I finally have clear insight into bestselling products, and reports help me make faster decisions.

t3.name: Nick Johnson
t3.quote: We saved hours of admin work thanks to Konty. Everything is transparent - from staff shifts to daily revenue reports.

t4.name: Anna Lazarus
t4.quote: Switching to Konty was a real relief. No more lost receipts or customer misunderstandings - the register works perfectly and it's as fast as we wanted.

t5.name: Dan Ellis
t5.quote: Konty POS lets me control multiple locations from one place. Sales, inventory, and reports are always up to date - saves me hours every week.

t6.name: Eva Richards
t6.quote: I recommend Konty to my clients because it's simple, reliable, and staff training is easy. Compared to old systems, it's night and day.

t7.name: Mark Cooper
t7.quote: I love how clear and modern the interface is. My employees mastered the system in less than a day.

t8.name: Sarah Nichols
t8.quote: I've been using Konty POS for a year now and it helped me increase profitability and reduce costs. For any small business - this is the right choice.
t8.role: Entrepreneur and Small Business Association Member

testimonials.title: Restaurant Owners Who Sleep Better Now
